title: Intensive Short-Term Business Foreign Language Course

context.additional_context: Remote learning tools supplemented with digital devices, emphasizing practical business foreign language skills for job seekers

learning_goals: Learners can utilize professional vocabulary and expressions required for business emails and presentations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can demonstrate appropriate business expressions for situational contexts at least three times in a video conference simulation
Learners can complete a draft of a business document with peers using collaboration tools and exchange feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
